name: itemHeadingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>` for each of the accordion items.

name: itemHeadingSize
description: The physical size of the accordion item titles (`xl`, `l`, `m`, `s` or `xs`). This will be ignored if JavaScript is enabled and the items will have a small heading.

params.name: title
params.description: The heading of each accordion section.

params.name: body
params.description: The HTML for the main body of the accordion item. Not displayed if `text` is set.

params.name: text
params.description:
The text for the accordion item which will be inserted into a `

` element. Overwrites `body` if it is set.

params.name: open
params.description: If true, open the accordion item. If a `group` is set, only one item in that group can be open.

name: id
description: A unique ID for the accordion group.

name: singleOpenItem
description: If true, only one accordion items can be opened at a time.

name: toggleAllButton
description: Allows the user to open or close all sections.

params.name: enabled
params.description: If true, add a button above the accordion that allows the user to open or close all sections.

params.name: openAllLabel
params.description: The label for the button when all sections are closed.

params.name: closeAllLabel
params.description: The label for the button when all sections are open.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the accordion.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the accordion.
